title: Muhammad Awwal Ibrahim Library
about: A private library in Minna. It contains books from varieties of sections of knowledge like history, sciences, engineering, mathematics, crafts, horticulture, etc.
services: Books reading and lending. Publishing and ISBN contacts.

title: Arts Gallery Minna
about: The National Gallery of Art is a parastatal of the Federal Ministry of Tourism, Culture and National Orientation, Nigeria responsible for the collection, preservation, documentation and presentation of Nigerias contemporary plastic arts, with headquarters at the prowling city of Minna.
services: Display and showcase of arts. Arts sales contacts.

title: JAMB Office
about: Joint Admission and Matriculation Board, Minna, Head Office.

title: Water Board
about: Waterboard office, Minna, Niger State. Providing water and sewage systems through the State.
services: Water lines repair, water distribution, payment of water bills.

title: INEC Office
about: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) was established by the 1999 Constitution of the Federal Republic of Nigeria to among other things organize elections into various political offices in the country.

title: Uphill
about: Situated high up on a hill as the name implies. It gives perfeect view of Minna from aerial.

title: Murtala Park
about: Murtala Park is located along Bosso Road. A very good location for outdoor events and recreation. A lot can be improved to make the park a lot better such as watering the grass in the morning and evening, regular maintenance of the equipments too.
features: CCTV, Security, carpet grasses, recreation, animal view, park.

title: Democracy Garden
about: A garden park for you and your loved ones with many recreational beauties.

title: Legbo Kutigi Hall
about: An event center located opposite Niger state Government house. It is a very big Hall that can accommodate 1000+ people. Has an in built speakers, a corridor and well ventilated hall. It also having a wide parking space for cars & space for outdoor events.
features: Luxurious rooms, halls for events, swimming pool.
